name: Silent Neighbours
description:
Old man discovers mysterious things happening around his house.

Control -
"A" - Move left.
"D" - Move right.
"Left Mouse Button" - to interact with objects.

Game contains no Save Game - but you can complete game in ~15 minutes.

Follow me - Dead Brain Gaming

Music Credits -

Konrad "FeniX" Gadzina
